channel.title: extractor, encrypted, qnap on E-M-B-A The firmware scanning environment
channel.description: Recent content in extractor, encrypted, qnap on E-M-B-A The firmware scanning environment

item.title: Qnap decryptor module
item.description: On my last pentest of a QNAP storage I have seen that EMBA was not able to extract the firmware files. After some digging and research I found out that the firmware update files from the download site are encrypted. Binwalk for the rescue was able to give a hint on it: This was the good. The bad is, that binwalk was not able to extract the firmware. This means I started with some recon.
